title: View Asset Maintenance History
description: A technician is investigating a recurring problem with a machine and wants to review its entire maintenance history.

tasks.description: Identify the asset in the CMMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent scans the asset's barcode or enters its ID to pull up its record.

tasks.description: Retrieve a list of all past maintenance work orders for that asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a complete history of all PMs and repairs.

tasks.description: Filter the history to show only corrective maintenance for 'motor faults' in the last year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the same motor fault has been reported three times in the past six months.
